author: Stereogum
title: David Bowie: The Last Five Years Documentary Suggests Blackstar-As-Farewell Narrative Was Overstated
text: David Bowie died two days after releasing Blackstar , and the prevailing narrative surrounding the album is that it was intended as a parting gift, a final goodbye from a man who knew his own death was imminent. But Francis Whately's upcoming documentary David Bowie: The Last Five Years , which airs on BBC on … More »
